mapper.select: select cart.cart_id, cart.cod_id, commodity.cod_name, commodity.image, shop.shop_name, commodity.price, cart.buy_number, cart.selected from cart inner join commodity on cart.cod_id = commodity.cod_id inner join shop on commodity.shop_id = shop.shop_id where cart.user_id = #{user_id} and to_order = 0
